title: South Korea
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,081 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 880L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and Y
description: South Korea explores many different aspects of this impressive country. From its culture and celebrations to its land and complex history, students will enjoy learning about this amazing place.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
